formula: T(n, k) = 2*A007318 + A103451 - 2*A000012, an infinite lower triangular matrix.
T(n, k) = 2*binomial(n, k) - 2 with T(n, 0) = T(n, n) = 1.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
program: def T(n, k): return 1 if (k==0 or k==n) else 2*binomial(n, k) - 2
flatten([[T(n,k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 14 2021
T:= func< n,k | k eq 0 or k eq n select 1 else 2*Binomial(n,k) - 2 >;
